content.question:
The following bar chart shows the relative frequency of days of rain for 30 days in four regions of a certain state.

Which of the following statements is not supported by the bar chart?

choices.label: Region D had the greatest percentage of days of rain.
Region B had the least percentage of days of rain.
Region A had more than 15 days of rain.
Region C had more than 25 days of rain.
Region D had less than 23 days of rain.

content.answer: Region C had more than 25 days of rain.

topic.text: 1.4: Representing a Categorical Variable with Graphs

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
